trans-unit.source: Compute Hosting Options Provided by Azure
trans-unit.target: Compute Hosting Options Provided by Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn about Azure compute hosting options and how they work: Virtual Machines, Websites, Cloud Services, and others.
trans-unit.target: Learn about Azure compute hosting options and how they work: Virtual Machines, Websites, Cloud Services, and others.

trans-unit.source: Compute Hosting Options Provided by Azure
trans-unit.target: Compute Hosting Options Provided by Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure provides different hosting models for running applications.
trans-unit.target: Azure provides different hosting models for running applications.

trans-unit.source: Each one provides a different set of services, and so which one you choose depends on exactly what you're trying to do.
trans-unit.target: Each one provides a different set of services, and so which one you choose depends on exactly what you're trying to do.

trans-unit.source: This article looks at the options, describing each technology and giving examples of when you'd use it.
trans-unit.target: This article looks at the options, describing each technology and giving examples of when you'd use it.

trans-unit.source: Compute Options
trans-unit.target: Compute Options

trans-unit.source: Audience
trans-unit.target: Audience

trans-unit.source: App Service
trans-unit.target: App Service

trans-unit.source: Scalable Web Apps, Mobile Apps, API Apps, and Logic Apps for any device
trans-unit.target: Scalable Web Apps, Mobile Apps, API Apps, and Logic Apps for any device

trans-unit.source: Cloud Services
trans-unit.target: Cloud Services

trans-unit.source: Highly available, scalable n-tier cloud apps with more control of the OS
trans-unit.target: Highly available, scalable n-tier cloud apps with more control of the OS

trans-unit.source: Virtual Machines
trans-unit.target: Virtual Machines

trans-unit.source: Customized Windows and Linux VMs with complete control of the OS
trans-unit.target: Customized Windows and Linux VMs with complete control of the OS

trans-unit.source: Other Options
trans-unit.target: Other Options

trans-unit.source: Azure also offers other compute hosting models for more specialized purposes, such as the following:
trans-unit.target: Azure also offers other compute hosting models for more specialized purposes, such as the following:

trans-unit.source: [Mobile Services](/services/mobile-services/)
trans-unit.target: [Mobile Services](/services/mobile-services/)

trans-unit.source: Optimized to provide a cloud back-end for apps that run on mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: Optimized to provide a cloud back-end for apps that run on mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: [Batch](/services/batch/)
trans-unit.target: [Batch](/services/batch/)

trans-unit.source: Optimized for processing large volumes of similar tasks, ideally workloads which lend themselves to running as parallel tasks on multiple computers.
trans-unit.target: Optimized for processing large volumes of similar tasks, ideally workloads which lend themselves to running as parallel tasks on multiple computers.

trans-unit.source: [HDInsight (Hadoop)](/services/hdinsight/)
trans-unit.target: [HDInsight (Hadoop)](/services/hdinsight/)

trans-unit.source: Optimized for running [MapReduce](http://www.asp.net/aspnet/overview/developing-apps-with-windows-azure/building-real-world-cloud-apps-with-windows-azure/data-storage-options/#hadoop) jobs on Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Optimized for running [MapReduce](http://www.asp.net/aspnet/overview/developing-apps-with-windows-azure/building-real-world-cloud-apps-with-windows-azure/data-storage-options/#hadoop) jobs on Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: What should I use?
trans-unit.target: What should I use?

trans-unit.source: Making a choice
trans-unit.target: Making a choice

trans-unit.source: All three of the general purpose Azure compute hosting models let you build scalable, reliable applications in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: All three of the general purpose Azure compute hosting models let you build scalable, reliable applications in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Given this essential similarity, which one should you use?
trans-unit.target: Given this essential similarity, which one should you use?

trans-unit.source: App Service is the best choice for most web apps.
trans-unit.target: App Service is the best choice for most web apps.

trans-unit.source: Deployment and management are integrated into the platform, sites can scale quickly to handle high traffic loads, and the built-in load balancing and traffic manager provide high availability.
trans-unit.target: Deployment and management are integrated into the platform, sites can scale quickly to handle high traffic loads, and the built-in load balancing and traffic manager provide high availability.

trans-unit.source: You can move existing sites to App Service easily with an [online migration tool](https://www.migratetoazure.net/), use an open-source app from the Web Application Gallery, or create a new site using the framework and tools of your choice.
trans-unit.target: You can move existing sites to App Service easily with an [online migration tool](https://www.migratetoazure.net/), use an open-source app from the Web Application Gallery, or create a new site using the framework and tools of your choice.

trans-unit.source: The [WebJobs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=390226) feature makes it easy to add background job processing to your app, or even run a compute workload that isn't a web app at all.
trans-unit.target: The [WebJobs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=390226) feature makes it easy to add background job processing to your app, or even run a compute workload that isn't a web app at all.

trans-unit.source: If you need more control over the web server environment, such as the ability to remote into your server or configure server startup tasks, Azure Cloud Services is typically the best option.
trans-unit.target: If you need more control over the web server environment, such as the ability to remote into your server or configure server startup tasks, Azure Cloud Services is typically the best option.

trans-unit.source: If you have an existing application that would require substantial modifications to run in Azure Websites or Azure Cloud Services, you could choose Azure Virtual Machines in order to simplify migrating to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: If you have an existing application that would require substantial modifications to run in Azure Websites or Azure Cloud Services, you could choose Azure Virtual Machines in order to simplify migrating to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: However, correctly configuring, securing, and maintaining VMs requires much more time and IT expertise compared to Azure Websites and Cloud Services.
trans-unit.target: However, correctly configuring, securing, and maintaining VMs requires much more time and IT expertise compared to Azure Websites and Cloud Services.

trans-unit.source: If you are considering Azure Virtual Machines, make sure you take into account the ongoing maintenance effort required to patch, update, and manage your VM environment.
trans-unit.target: If you are considering Azure Virtual Machines, make sure you take into account the ongoing maintenance effort required to patch, update, and manage your VM environment.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, no single option is right.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes, no single option is right.

trans-unit.source: In situations like this, it's perfectly legal to combine options.
trans-unit.target: In situations like this, it's perfectly legal to combine options.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you're building an application where you'd like the management benefits of Cloud Services web roles, but you also need to use standard SQL Server hosted in a Virtual Machine for compatibility or performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: For example, suppose you're building an application where you'd like the management benefits of Cloud Services web roles, but you also need to use standard SQL Server hosted in a Virtual Machine for compatibility or performance reasons.
